feed.title: Windhawk Mod Updates
feed.subtitle: Updates in the official collection of Windhawk mods

entry.title: Cycle taskbar buttons with mouse wheel 1.1.9
entry.content:
• Made mouse wheel cycling and keyboard shortcuts optional, so that only one of them can be selected and used.
  • Improved compatibility with status bar programs such as YASB and Zebar.
  • Added an option to customize the old taskbar on Windows 11.

entry.title: Taskbar keyboard-only auto-hide 1.1.1
entry.content: • Fixed Win+num hotkeys not working when the "Fully hide" option is enabled.

entry.title: Taskbar keyboard-only auto-hide 1.1
entry.content:
• Added support for secondary taskbars.
  • Added the "Fully hide" option. Normally, the taskbar is hidden to a thin line which can be clicked to unhide it. The new option makes it so that the taskbar is fully hidden on auto-hide, leaving no traces at all. With this option, the taskbar can only be unhidden via the keyboard.

entry.title: Start menu open location 1.0
entry.content:
Start menu open location

When clicking the Start button, opens the Start Menu on the monitor where the mouse cursor is located, or in a custom monitor of choice.

entry.title: Taskbar auto-hide when maximized 1.2.2
entry.content:
• Hide the taskbar for fullscreen windows for the "Auto-hide only when a window is maximized" mode.
  • Fixed taskbar thumbnails causing the taskbar to hide and then show up again right away (the fix in v1.2.1 wasn't complete).

entry.title: Multirow taskbar for Windows 11 1.1
entry.content:
• Added an option to have the start button occupy the full taskbar height.
  • The mod now always switches to left icon alignment, since centered icons aren't supported.
  • Fixed taskbar context menu positions for all but the first row.
  • Fixed an incompatibility with recent Windows 11 preview builds.

entry.title: Windows 10 Colored Borders 1.0.0
entry.content:
Windows 10 Colored Borders

Starting from Windows 10 version 1809, the borders of active windows aren't colored unless the user enables the option to color titlebars. This mod reverts that behavior and makes active borders always use the user's accent color regardless.

⚠ Important usage note ⚠

In order to use this mod, you must allow Windhawk to inject into the dwm.exe system process. To do so, add it to the process inclusion list in the advanced settings. If you do not do this, it will silently fail to inject.

  • Fixed the new colored battery icon not being rotated.
  • Fixed a bug which could cause the taskbar to become hidden on system startup.
